last_episode_to_air.name: A Place for Everyone
last_episode_to_air.overview: The day of Diego and Amelia's wedding — and Clara's father's execution — brings multiple last-minute surprises for everyone at Castamar.

name: The Cook of Castamar
overview: Set in early 18th-century Madrid, the plot follows the love story between an agoraphobic cook and a widowed nobleman.

episodes.name: The Essential Ingredient
episodes.overview: Almost two years after a devastating loss, the Duke of Castamar hosts a big party. An agoraphobic Clara is forced to prove herself at her new job.

guest_stars.character: Josefa Laso de la Vega y de Figueroa
guest_stars.name: Puchi Lagarde

episodes.name: The Night of the King
episodes.overview: When the king goes missing during the party, Diego and his friends search for him. Meanwhile, Clara makes an unexpected discovery she must keep secret.

guest_stars.character: Josefa Laso de la Vega y de Figueroa
guest_stars.name: Puchi Lagarde

episodes.name: Credo Ut Intelligam
episodes.overview: Amelia has shocking news for Enrique. The queen asks Melquíades to covertly find an important document. A fire threatens Rosalia's future at Castamar.

episodes.name: Fly Away
episodes.overview: Singer Carlo Broschi is invited to perform a concert at Castamar. Diego meets a young woman and Clara gets jealous. During the party, tragedy strikes.

guest_stars.character: Josefa Laso de la Vega y de Figueroa
guest_stars.name: Puchi Lagarde

episodes.name: The Decision
episodes.overview: Diego, feeling conflicted about his night with Amelia, turns to an old friend for advice. Clara's guilt engulfs her. Gabriel is distrustful of Enrique.

episodes.name: Where No Light Shines
episodes.overview: Diego and Amelia celebrate their news but Gabriel voices his suspicions. Sol waits for her wish to be fulfilled. Enrique remembers a failed plan.

episodes.name: So We Are Not Erased
episodes.overview: When Clara is found unconscious, Diego insists on staying by her bedside, no matter the social implications. Amelia, however, won't be deterred.

episodes.name: What Is Not to Be
episodes.overview: Diego helps Clara search for evidence of her condemned father's innocence. Enrique plots to frame Francisco. Amelia asks Elisa for a favor.

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: Amelia faces a serious complication with her pregnancy and turns to an unexpected source for help. Alfredo searches for a missing Gabriel.

episodes.name: What Really Matters
episodes.overview: After a wounded Alfredo reports back to Castamar, Diego desperately looks for his brother. Úrsula is tormented by someone from her past.

episodes.name: Lub-dub
episodes.overview: Diego resorts to kidnapping in an attempt to find Enrique so he can seek vengeance. Amelia acts as Gabriel's caretaker and tries to lift his spirits.

episodes.name: A Place for Everyone
episodes.overview: The day of Diego and Amelia's wedding — and Clara's father's execution — brings multiple last-minute surprises for everyone at Castamar.
